articles.title: Antarctic ocean currents heading for collapse- report - BBC
articles.description: Melting ice could trigger a disastrous chain reaction, a new Australian study warns
articles.content:
Rapidly melting Antarctic ice is causing a dramatic slowdown in deep ocean currents and could have a disastrous effect on the climate, a new report warns.
The deep-water flows which drive ocean curr… [+3318 chars]
